original_text: And it came to pass, when they had done circumcising all the people, that they abode in their places in the camp, till they were whole.
korean_text: 또 그 모든 백성에게 할례 행하기를 마치매 백성이 진중 각 처소에 머물며 낫기를 기다릴 때에

sentences.original_text: when they had done circumcising all the people
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 모든 백성에게 할례를 행했을 때

sentences.original_text: that they abode in their places in the camp
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 진영에 있는 그들의 장소에 머물렀고
